md:
giải nghĩa từ "focus" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Focus (noun)
	* Meaning: sự tập trung, điểm chú ý
	* Example: The focus of the meeting was on the new project.
	* Related words: concentrate, attention, emphasis

2. Focus (verb)
	* Meaning: tập trung, điều chỉnh
	* Example: Can you focus the camera on the subject?
	* Related words: adjust, concentrate, aim

3. Focus (photography)
	* Meaning: độ sắc nét, sự rõ ràng
	* Example: The focus of the lens is not sharp enough.
	* Related words: blur, clarity, sharpness

4. Focus (psychology)
	* Meaning: sự tập trung tinh thần, điểm chú ý
	* Example: The therapist helped the patient to focus on their feelings.
	* Related words: attention, concentration, mindfulness

5. Focus (business)
	* Meaning: điểm mạnh, điểm chú ý
	* Example: The company's focus is on customer service.
	* Related words: priority, emphasis, target

Note: Depending on the context, the word "focus" can have different meanings and connotations.
html:
giải nghĩa từ "focus" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  1. Focus (noun)

    • Meaning: sự tập trung, điểm chú ý
    • Example: The focus of the meeting was on the new project.

  2. Focus (verb)

    • Example: Can you focus the camera on the subject?
    • Related words: adjust, concentrate, aim

  3. Focus (photography)

    • Example: The focus of the lens is not sharp enough.
    • Related words: blur, clarity, sharpness

  4. Focus (psychology)

    • Example: The therapist helped the patient to focus on their feelings.
    • Related words: attention, concentration, mindfulness

  5. Focus (business)

Note: Depending on the context, the word "focus" can have different meanings and connotations.
